column5: Got a new secret weapon for bass fishing. Puts tonnes of fish in the boat !
That little guy is a darned fish'n machine
When is he going to start booking lessons for the rest of us to learn to do that!
A seasoned pro already, VanDam better be looking over his shoulders as someone is looking to take him down a notch or 2.
Wow very impressive
good to see you have a good guide to control to trolling motor to make sure you actually fish the good spots
the first 2 or 3 times are fun but wait until he starts telling you what you are doing wrong
The young lad has a good build,he's going to kick your" lure out of the way to show what you should use soon enough lol.Great to see he's enjoying it!!!!! Nice fish as well  .
He's the Man; for sure.
I like.

thanks for the kind words guys I gave him my senko rod to use as that was the only spinning rod that I brought with me. I was throwing the jig all weekend. Needless to say that the bass really wanted the senko. He has really learned patience and he will listen to me when I say " check your line, if you feel anything set the hook " He got his PB all by himself about 4 lbs.
Good job there. Love it when the kids take to outdoor stuff
Good stuff Mike!! Thats what its all about right there!  S.
He looks proud, and he has every reason to be!
Awesome !!! The smiles say it all !!! And he is going to be a fisherman forever now !!!! Great to see kids loving fishing !!!! Cheers
How cute is he!!! Was just looking at his foot on the trolling motor...that generation is so good with electronics!! It's amazing!  Nice fish too!
Got him trained on the motor as well!!!   Good job!
Here is another pic that I got from my phone
Quick question: is he for rent? I'll pay with candy and milkshakes.
Hey Mike, the kid sure looks like he's having fun, well done!!  Congratulations on the PB to him and congrats on the new boat partner for you!!
Awesome!!! Looks like he's eyeing some key cover in that first pic. Must be proud of the little guy!
